sys_hub_flow.description:
Related variable set: Approval - Manager Auto-Approver or Create Task
This subflow will auto-approve on behalf of a manager, via work note, or it will create a task for an assignment group to reach out to the manager for approval manually.

Related variable set: Approval - Manager Auto-Approver or Create Task
This subflow will auto-approve on behalf of a manager, via work note, or it will create a task for an assignment group to reach out to the manager for approval manually.
